description: PolicyCheck clause type registry. Agent developers write rules against these identifiers. Names are stable within a major version. v1.0.1: Added source-aware severity weighting â€” ToS boilerplate clauses (binding_arbitration, class_action_waiver, termination_at_will, liability_cap) are downgraded to low severity when found only in terms_of_service during URL-based analysis.

binding_arbitration.description: Disputes must be resolved through binding arbitration, not courts

class_action_waiver.description: Buyer waives right to participate in class action lawsuits

liability_cap.description: Seller limits maximum liability, often to purchase price or a fixed amount

termination_at_will.description: Seller can terminate account or service at any time without cause

jurisdiction_clause.description: Disputes must be resolved in a specific jurisdiction chosen by seller

auto_renewal.description: Subscription or service automatically renews unless cancelled

no_returns.description: Seller does not accept returns at all

final_sale.description: All sales are final, no refunds or exchanges

restocking_fee.description: A percentage fee is deducted from refund on returned items

return_shipping_fee.description: Buyer must pay shipping costs to return items

short_return_window.description: Return window is shorter than the industry standard 30 days

exchange_only.description: Returns result in exchange or store credit only, no cash refund

store_credit_only.description: Refunds issued as store credit rather than original payment method

non_refundable_categories.description: Certain product categories are excluded from returns/refunds

no_refund_opened.description: Opened or used items cannot be returned for a refund

no_refund.description: All sales are final, no refunds provided

price_adjustment_clause.description: Seller reserves right to adjust prices after purchase

hidden_fees.description: Additional fees not clearly disclosed upfront

data_selling.description: Seller sells or shares personal data with third parties for profit

broad_data_collection.description: Seller collects more personal data than necessary for the transaction

long_handling_time.description: Unusually long handling or processing time before shipment
